original: Saraṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: saraṇam paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā araṇam paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Saraṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: saraṇam mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo
analyzed: hetu paccayā araṇam mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Araṇaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
